title: Senna's E is like combining release Thresh's W with release Akali's W
body:
Thresh's W used to shield all nearby allies. It was reduced to one ally by the next year.

Akali's W used to grant a new level of stealth called "Obscurity." It was nerfed to regular Invisibility by the next year.

Senna's E will grant Obscurity to all nearby allies. I'll be surprised if it takes a year to nerf it (and/or to gut Senna).
